## Problem

What problem does this feature solve? (e.g., "I'm frustrated when...")

## Proposed Solution

A clear description of what you'd like to happen.

## Alternatives Considered

Any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Additional Context

Any other context, screenshots, or examples about the feature request.
